Reviews.Title: Super easy, cheap, and sleek.
Reviews.Author: TechGuy
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera from Wally-World about 6 months ago. and I have to say, I love it. The image on the screen can be a bit blurry, though the camera itself takes crisp, clear photos. For the price, it couldn't be beat. This isn't exactly your, "I'm gonna take long zoom photos of Jimmy on graduation day", but you'll definitely get some great medium to close up shots. The interface is very easy to use. Overall, great camera to throw in a bag and always have with you, to capture those special moments.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Beatriz Borges
Reviews.Content: I really liked this camera really is a product highly recommend and am very pleased with the quality and the working conditions as it comes and accessories.Best Regards

Reviews.Title: 48 hours into use it broke
Reviews.Author: kbaa
Reviews.Content: button on back turns it on un-expectantly in addition to top normal button. It turned on and broke 48 hours into our ownership. Got out of line and wouldn't go back in track. Don't just have camera must always store in case and take out when you want to use it instead of holding onto it on vacation for quick use.

Reviews.Title: on off button
Reviews.Author: Dennis Robbins
Reviews.Content: It seems like when I lean aginst the camera case the camera comes on. You have to be careful because the on button extends above the camera casing. Other wise all is good with it

Reviews.Title: Love this camera with battery chargers holds lots of pictures in memory! 5 STARS
Reviews.Author: Daria Thomas "Trent's mommie"
Reviews.Content: very very pleased with this camera and it's so nice it comes with the battery charger.  super clear picture and memory holds a lot of photos highly recommend

Reviews.Title: stunning images
Reviews.Author: rik25
Reviews.Content: high quality easy to use and super comfortable the product was as expected very good the model is excellent for trips so recommend

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Alfred
Reviews.Content: Small and portable like a slike photo ... This camera take amazing photos its worth the money well if you like a gift it's perfect

Reviews.Title: Not that great.
Reviews.Author: Ivon GOnzalez
Reviews.Content: The camara had some issues, the pictures were not that great and when I press to review the pictures some of them I was unable to see.

Reviews.Title: take perfect pictures,very clear image!!!!good catch for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: felix
Reviews.Content: like new!!!!very happy!!!!works great!!!!I recomended this seller,is perfect for my job,i chef,take good food pictures,very rich quality videos,nice sharp!!!!I loved

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Christopher C.
Reviews.Content: Well this camera is great quality for its price and size! But for best photos you need to turn auto exposure setting to "PROGRAM"  and the ISO to "100", The rest of the settings can pretty much be left on auto.  Because of that I gave the camera 4 stars instead of 5 since some of its advertised features still need work and you need to manipulate them just a tad. The other reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is this - The quality of the photos and video is excellent however the quality becomes a bit lacking when you get really zoomed in. While this may be expected, it goes directly against part of what the camera is advertised to do.Overall though, I'd highly recommend this camera as something to keep with you to take high quality spontaneous photos. Like I said just remember to change those two settings because the camera is not at its best performance with default settings.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Jonathan D. Hirt
Reviews.Content: I picked this up when my iPhone 4 camera started taking blurry pictures and it does a great job. It's very lightweight, I often will forget it's even in my pocket and it's great to take out and about while hiking or running around. The battery lasts quite awhile and it takes quality pictures. No complaints with this camera, it does its job nicely.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: This item is easy enough for my 5 year old to use but still takes nice clear pictures.  Seems nice and durable considering it has already been dropped a few times.

Reviews.Title: loved it!
Reviews.Author: nvromero
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! I took pictures of when I went to the mountains and the beach and the pictures are beautiful. The panorama setting is also an interesting feature which I am still learning how to do. I think this was a great camera for the price I bought it for. I have not had any issues with it at all. It includes the camera, battery and charger, USB cable, and the manual on how to use the camera.

Reviews.Title: excelente vendedor
Reviews.Author: LUIS RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: como lo describe la publicacion tremenda camara tomas las fotos 100% reales graba videos tomas varias fotos a la vez

Reviews.Title: I thought it was better
Reviews.Author: ventarron
Reviews.Content: It as several good features, but it is very bad when you take photos in low light and even worse if you zoom. Also at the slightest movement of the hand you get out of focus pictures. I did not like it. Frankly I do not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Hilda M. Medina
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, a toda la familia le encanto, la disfrutamos mucho. la recomiendo, y es facil de usar, muy buen producto.

Reviews.Title: Sony camera
Reviews.Author: Joye Childers
Reviews.Content: I bought the Sony because I had had another sony since 2005.  Haven't used it enough to rate higher. Okay

Reviews.Title: Cmera which may over delight a customer.
Reviews.Author: Jawaid A.
Reviews.Content: it is a very useful mini camera. Produced highly satisfactory result. It is cot effective  where the cost shall justify the choice which is being made for purchase of this cam.

Reviews.Title: Okay camera
Reviews.Author: Sally D.
Reviews.Content: This camera is okay but not as easy to operate as its predecessor.  It does not take as clear pictures and it is slow to auto focus.  Also, the battery is always dead because whatever button gets bumped, it powers on.  The setup is not as straightforward and the options are less, particularly with the flash.  Instead of the several options on the previous model now there is only auto or off.  I bought it because I owned a Sony Cyber-shot for years and loved it.  This camera may have 14.1 rather than 8 MP but overall it is not an improved product.

Reviews.Title: Super slow and does not connect to the computer for uploading.
Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: I should have read the other reviews prior to ordering this camera.  They are correct, it is super slow and I would return the camera but I threw away the box.  Also it will not connect to my computer so I can not upload the photos I did manage to take.  It is super light which is fine, plastic or metal isn't a big deal and lighter is better these days but it is by far a sub-standard product.  Spend the extra $20 or more on a better camera and it might be a good idea to go into a store to check out the look and feel before you order it.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: DMP
Reviews.Content: First, they do not tell you that you have to buy a gazillion dollar memory card. Then, after you do and take pictures, there is no way that you can import photos. I've spent six hours trying to import my few photos into my computer and it can't be done. I've been everywhere--including their site, the disk they enclose, every Google search I can make and no one can tell me how to simply import the photos. My computer won't recognize the camera. I give up and I will never, never, never, never buy another Sony product, period. And I *did* buy it from Amazon--it's a certified purchase.
